root.name: DOA BlackJack
root.description: DOA BlackJack ~ The Kasumi Version ~ was an exclusive iPhone game featuring Kasumi as the lead character. She plays as the card dealer. The money collected can be used to purchase exclusive images of Kasumi. Players can also unlock new costumes.On February 22nd, 2010, DOA BlackJack ~The Kasumi Version~ was suspended from the Apple App Store for unknown reasons. It was later revealed that the game did not meet Apple's new censorship rules (DOA BlackJack has bouncing breast physics and partial nudity).
